description: I can't swear if this is generative AI in action, but I'm pretty sure it is.

description: COD fatigue might finally be taking its toll.
title: Black Ops 7's launch day Steam player count is significantly lower than last year's Call of Duty, suggesting Arc Raiders and Battlefield 6 ate a hefty portion of its lunch

description: "We knew we were asking for unusual things," says Newell, "and Oceanco embraced it with open arms."

description: And apparently Epic Games will be making games for it, too.

description: "Even if our execution had been perfect, and we see plainly that it was not, it is clear that grinding Power will never be a substitute for earning a trophy."

description: I'm going to buy one for every room in my house.

description: Just a few weeks before its planned release in December, the upcoming life sim has been pushed all the way back to May 2026.
